message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a price of $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000, which is the price I'm willing to pay for the product.
I understand that $1200000 is a good price for you, but I'd like to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1350000.
I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1350000. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $1250000, which is as high as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting stuck in a loop. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal soon.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1300000, but I'm still a bit above that. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1280000, which is my final offer.
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to go below $1290000. I'm willing to make one last concession to meet you in the middle, so I'm offering the product to you for $1295000
I'm not willing to pay $1295000. I'm still willing to meet you in the middle, but I think we can do better than that. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1290000, which is the best I can do.

I've made concessions throughout this negotiation, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $1290000. I'm going to meet you at $1290000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1290000. I'm willing to make one last attempt to reach a deal. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1280000, which is my absolute final offer.
